Over a year ago, I started purchasing 2-3 bags a month thru Amazon Subscribe and Save.  Generally, the bags are good quality & dust free.  However, the previous 2 months were of such poor quality with a dust content so significant, the white bedding was brown… worse was the dust plume & smell.  My GP went into sneezing fits, as did I.  Initially, I tried mixing with a locally purchased bags.  However, the two bags received last month were so bad, I just threw them away & purchased locally.  Obviously, bedding is expensive & I had decided to end this subscription. However, with May being a crazy, busy month, I forgot.  I was thrilled to discover the 2 bags this month are CLEAN! This is the only brand of white bedding available on Amazon that is soft, absorbent, dye free… & usually dust free… and also a reasonable price.  I change my Guinea pig bedding far more than is probably necessary, thus bedding is a huge expense. This product is available in larger size bags at a fairly reasonable price. Given delivery is of high importance for me, I will continue the subscription, re-evaluating on month to month basis.

Review: The kaytee clean and cozy white bedding is very soft... like shredded facial tissue but it tends to have a lot of white tissue dust flying around during cleanup and refilling. Once it stays inside the bin of the cage, no dust floats around so I guess we still use this as it is hard to find soft bedding. We actually mix this up with the petsmart full cheeks bedding. The full cheeks bedding is rough like shredded paper but less dust so we mix them together. We've tried different brands of bedding and these are the two that we decided to use and our hamster is happy. So far it has been clean with no issues at all. We use a pack of this for 2 months given we use half this and half full cheeks to fill up the prevue cage.Now for absorbency and smell. This has been absorbent and more absorbent than the full cheeks one as it is like shredded tissue that's why we cannot fully use full cheeks even if it has less dust. It is also very easy to clean as it becomes clumpy when wet and does not scatter around. It also covers the bad smell quite good. It also expands pretty good as it is packed really well so for what you're paying for, it's a good value. Beddings are not cheap! If you like soft tissue bedding for your hamster then this is the one for you.

It’s like having a little extra luxury while on the road.Stays in Place: The elastic edges keep it securely in place, even when the RV is moving. No more adjusting or tugging it back into position. Review: Needed new pillows for support. Had been buying cheaper ones that needed to be replaced every year, until they stopped lasting that long. Tried these and I loved them the very first night. Have been using them for almost a year now. I love how I lay my head in the middle of the pillow, and the pillow supports the curve of my neck along with my head. When I change positions, the pillow goes back to it's original shape. I am normally a side sleeper. Pillow supports me no matter what position I am laying in. They are so comfortable, I replaced my husband's with these. He really loves his too. I wouldn't try washing them because I believe they are too large and thick for mine. I bought the queen size for both of us.  But the price is so reasonable, that I am comfortable with just buying new ones when and if needed. I now have no desire to try any other pillow.They don't make me hot either. Temperature seems consistent.They are definitely worth trying. I know I will be buying these again.  Haven't been sorry even one night.

Review: I was initially attracted to this comforter because of its vibrant green color and soft feel. It adds a nice pop of color to my bedroom and complements the decor perfectly. The fabric is comfortable and feels smooth against the skin, which enhances my sleeping experience.However, upon receiving the comforter, I found that it was thinner than I had expected. While it provides adequate warmth, especially during the warmer months, I prefer a thicker comforter for added coziness during colder nights.On the positive side, the comforter is well-made with quality stitching and it appears durable. It has held up well through several washes without losing its color or shape, which is a definite plus.In conclusion, this green comforter is a great addition to my bedroom decor and meets most of my expectations in terms of comfort and quality. If you prefer a thicker comforter for extra warmth, you may want to consider layering it with an additional blanket or exploring thicker options. Overall, I am satisfied with my purchase and would recommend it for its color, comfort, and durability.

As someone who values both comfort and style in their home decor, I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Janzaa King Size Comforter Set, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations!From the moment I laid eyes on the set, I was impressed by its elegant design and attention to detail. The sage green color exudes a sense of tranquility and sophistication, perfectly complementing my bedroom's aesthetic. The ruffled comforter and pillowcases add a touch of vintage farmhouse charm, giving my space a cozy and inviting atmosphere.But it's not just about looks – this comforter set delivers on comfort as well. Made from soft and fluffy materials, it feels like sleeping on a cloud. The plushness of the comforter provides just the right amount of warmth and coziness, making it ideal for year-round use. Whether I'm curling up with a book on a chilly winter night or enjoying a lazy Sunday morning in bed, this comforter set ensures that I stay comfortable and snug.I also appreciate the quality craftsmanship of the set. The stitching is impeccable, ensuring that the comforter and pillowcases retain their shape and durability wash after wash.
